resources.string:
ABOUT PACMON:
 This game is made by Qui Phu Lu
 and Hanzen Lim.

 This is a project for mobile 
 development class in SFSU under
 the supervision of Prof. Puder

 SUPPORT:
 email us: pacmon.info@gmail.com

HOW TO PLAY:
 User control pacmon using accelerometer.
 Tilt left to move Pacmon left.
 Tilt right to move Pacmon right.
 Tilt up to move Pacmon up.
 Tilt down to move Pacmon down.

 MultiPlayer
 Two device must be connected
 to WiFi inorder to play against each
 other. One device should be
 the server and another one should
 be the client.
